cell_status_enable.title: Enable cell status display
cell_status_enable.description: Whether to display cell execution status

cell_status_queue.title: Pending color
cell_status_queue.description: The pending (queued for execution) color for the cell run status

cell_status_success.title: Success color
cell_status_success.description: The base color for the successful cell run status

cell_status_error.title: Error color
cell_status_error.description: The base color for the errored cell run status

cell_flash_enable.title: Enable flash
cell_flash_enable.description: Whether to display cell flash on execution completion

cell_flash_duration.title: Cell flash duration (seconds)
cell_flash_duration.description: The duration of the cell flash effect animation (in seconds)

cell_flash_colour.title: Cell flash colour
cell_flash_colour.description: The colour of the cell flash effect animation

cell_status_audio_success.title: Successful cell execution audio
cell_status_audio_success.description: Audible alert of successful cell execution completion status

cell_status_audio_error.title: Unsuccessful cell execution audio
cell_status_audio_error.description: Audible alert of unsuccessful cell execution completion status

cell_status_error_spoken_alert.title: Speak cell error type
cell_status_error_spoken_alert.description: Spoken alert announcing cell number following unsuccessful cell execution

cell_status_heartbeat.title: [NOT YET IMPLEMENTED] Enable heartbeat
cell_status_heartbeat.description: Audible heartbeat for long running cells

toolbar.title: File System Access browser toolbar items

disabled.title: Whether the item is ignored or not

icon.title: Item icon id
icon.description: If defined, it will override the command icon

label.title: Item label
label.description: If defined, it will override the command label

activity_color.title: Activity color
activity_color.description: The base color for the activity cell background

solution_color.title: Solution color
solution_color.description: The base color for the solution cell background

learner_color.title: Learner color
learner_color.description: The base color for the learner cell background

tutor_color.title: Tutor color
tutor_color.description: The base color for the tutor cell background

activity_tag.title: Activity tag name
activity_tag.description: Tag body (ex- of prefix) to identify activity

solution_tag.title: Solution tag name
solution_tag.description: Tag body (ex- of prefix) to identify solution

learner_tag.title: Learner tag name
learner_tag.description: Tag body (ex- of prefix) to identify learner

tutor_tag.title: Tutor tag name
tutor_tag.description: Tag body (ex- of prefix) to identify tutor

singleClickToUnfold.title: Single Click To Unfold
singleClickToUnfold.description: Whether a single click triggers an (un)fold.
